title: 'Not really up here to make friends': Will GOP lawmakers stick together in 2025?
shortDescription: Republicans may have secured a trifecta, but they have narrow majorities in both the House and Senate.

title: Trump nominates Elon Musk associate Jared Isaacman to run NASA
shortDescription: Isaacmen and three fellow private astronauts were the first commercial astronauts to walk in space.

title: Peter Navarro to join Trump White House as trade advisor
shortDescription: Navarro was convicted of refusing to comply with a subpoena from the congressional committee investigating the Jan. 6, 2021 U.S. Capitol attack.

title: Montana lawmakers vote against anti-trans bathroom rule in capitol
shortDescription: Montana lawmakers join forces to reject state capitol bathroom ban for transgender legislator, Zooey Zephyr

title: Judge says Biden tried to 'rewrite history' in pardoning Hunter
shortDescription: U.S. District Judge Mark Scarsi wrote that "nowhere does the Constitution give the President the authority to rewrite history."

title: Trump mulls replacing Hegseth with DeSantis to run Pentagon
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump is considering dropping Pete Hegseth as his pick to lead the Pentagon, choosing Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis in his place.

title: Democrat flips California congressional seat by 187 votes
shortDescription: In the last congressional race to be callled, results from the California Secretary of State showed Adam Gray ahead of Rep. John Duarte by 187 votes.

title: Trump Mexico's Sheinbaum disagree on border talk. | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: How anti-abortion leaders are approaching a second Trump term. | The struggles of one community in Black Appalachia after Helene.

title: Canadian PM Justin Trudeau visits Trump for tariff talk | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: President-elect Donald Trump's election success in the Rio Grande Valley, a Latino-majority area along the border in south Texas.

title: President Biden pardons his son Hunter Biden | The Excerpt
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump threatens BRIC nations with tariffs if they 'move away' from the U.S. dollar. Plus more top stories on The Excerpt.

title: South Korea's president declared martial law. Now he faces impeachment
shortDescription: South Korean opposition parties submitted a bill to Parliament to impeach President Yoon Suk Yeol.

title: Trump considering DeSantis to replace Hegseth for Pentagon post
shortDescription: Pete Hegseth's nomination to lead the Pentagon has run into trouble on Capitol Hill over allegations about his personal and professional life.

title: Capitol Christmas tree annual lighting ceremony
shortDescription: An 80-foot Sitka Spruce from Tongass National Forest was selected for the 60th annual lighting ceremony, making a 4,000 mile whistle-stop tour through the country to the Capitol in Washington, D.C.

title: Donald Trump DEA pick Chad Chronister withdraws, citing 'gravity' of job
shortDescription: Sheriff Chad Chronister said in a statement that he decided to withdraw after "the gravity of this very important responsibility set in."

title: Trump team signs agreement for background checks for administration picks
shortDescription: There was bipartisan pressure on Trump to have FBI background checks of his Cabinet picks. Some have been under scrutiny over personal issues.

title: Trump asks for NY criminal verdict to be tossed based on election
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump filed a motion to have his New York criminal hush money convictions dismissed as he prepares to return to the White House

title: Martial law caused a crisis in South Korea. Could it happen in the US?
shortDescription: Though martial law isn't well defined in U.S. law, it has been imposed at the state and federal level to respond to emergencies.

title: What we know about Hunter Biden's pardon
shortDescription: Could Joe Biden's pardon of his son Hunter set a precedent moving forward? Here is what we know now.

title: No, Georgia court didn't dismiss Trump case in November | Fact check
shortDescription: The case had not been dismissed by the state Supreme Court when the post was shared. The state Court of Appeals listed it as pending.

title: People with disabilities make less than minimum wage. Biden wants to change that
shortDescription: The Labor Department proposed to eliminate wages below the federal minimum for people with disabilities. But Trump could reverse it.

title: Trump links Hunter Biden's pardon to Jan. 6 rioters | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: Mexican views of migration harden. E-cigarette makers hope SCOTUS will give President-elect Donald Trump a chance to greenlight flavored vapes.

title: Idaho's 'abortion trafficking' law partly cleared by court
shortDescription: Idaho can enforce a law against those who harbor or transport a minor to get an abortion out of state without parental consent, a federal appeals court ruled.

title: Trump nominees Hegseth, Patel face scrutiny from Senate Republicans
shortDescription: Senate Republicans say they are open to supporting the president-elect's decisions. But they also want to see precedent followed.

title: These are the Miami voters who helped Trump win the election
shortDescription: Donald Trump’s criticism of migrants didn’t deter Venezuelans or other Hispanic voters in Miami from supporting the now-president-elect.

title: Trump, DeSantis attend memorial for Florida sheriff's deputies who died in crash
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump and Gov. Ron DeSantis travel to Palm Beach County to honor three motorcycle deputies who died in a Nov. 21 crash.

title: President Biden scolded by fellow Democrats for pardoning son
shortDescription: President Biden is facing a backlash from fellow Democrats in addition to Republican rivals for his "full and unconditional" pardon of Hunter Biden.
